concept.title: User and Group for Service Start
concept.shortdesc: When you run as a service, you must create a system user and group named sdc, or you must edit the values of the SDC_USER and SDC_GROUP environment variables to point to an existing system user or group.

conbody.p:
SDC_USERenvironment variableSDC_GROUPenvironment variableenvironment variablessystem userenvironment variablessystem groupThe $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdcd-env.sh file includes the following user and group environment variables:
SDC_USER - Defines the system user used to run as a service. Default is sdc.
SDC_GROUP - Defines the system group used to run as a service. Default is sdc.
